answers.answer: Try to massage your feet so you can feel somewhat relive. Try reading less salt since the salt make you retain water and that's how feet get swollen.
I mean eating not reading hehe

Go for a pedicure! You can ask them to massage your feet and ankles a bit more and they should do it! (Perks of being preggy) besides going for a little spa treatment is what you deserve you've been carrying all that extra weight your body needs some relaxation. X
You may have been on your feet too much. Relax and put a pillow under your feet. Stay off your feet as much as you can.
Go for a spa day for yourself: )
Tey sit with your feet high above the heart level and swelling should start to go

question: My feet have been horribly swollen since yesterday! Anyone know anything that helps?I thought it would go away when I woke up this morning, but it didn't!TIA!:)(I don't have preeclampsia! I had an appointment yesterday when they were swollen like this, but everything was fine!)
title: horribly swollen feet!! help?
